content: This is the FHIR Developer Days 2016 channel for the Logical Models track.

Note to all participants: during the hands-on sessions we will use Forge, a FHIR profile editor (as a Windows desktop application) and Simplifier, an online FHIR profile registry. Visit https://www.simplifier.net/ to register a free personal account and download the Forge application. Especially for the participants of the hands-on sessions, we will also distribute a brand new Beta Forge release that will be published online after the DevDays.
Safe travels!
Note to participants: for the hands-on portion of the logical modelling track, we'll be doing an openEHR based exercise- see the openEHR track topcic for more details
Not even a day in and we already have a GOTO
all good IT starts with a GOTO
